articles.headline: China Has a New Playbook to Counter Trump: ‘Supply Chain Warfare’
articles.snippet: A series of swipes at American companies show how China could take the initiative in a new trade war, using its economic dominance to exact pain.
articles.abstract: A series of swipes at American companies show how China could take the initiative in a new trade war, using its economic dominance to exact pain.
articles.lead_paragraph: In the world of cheap drones, Skydio was the great American hope. Its autonomous flying machines gave the U.S. defense and police agencies an alternative to Chinese manufacturers, free from the security concerns tied to dependence on Chinese supply chains.
articles.byline: By Alexandra Stevenson and Paul Mozur

articles.headline: Musk’s Slashing of the Federal Budget Faces Big Hurdles
articles.snippet: The so-called Department of Government Efficiency, with Elon Musk as co-leader, has advantages that past budget-cutters did not, but laws and court challenges can still make change slow and difficult.
articles.abstract: The so-called Department of Government Efficiency, with Elon Musk as co-leader, has advantages that past budget-cutters did not, but laws and court challenges can still make change slow and difficult.
articles.lead_paragraph: These are frenzied times for the nascent Department of Government Efficiency.
articles.byline: By David A. Fahrenthold, Alan Rappeport, Theodore Schleifer and Annie Karni

articles.headline: F.T.C. Launches Antitrust Investigation Into Microsoft
articles.snippet: Regulators are demanding information from the company on its cloud computing, artificial intelligence and cybersecurity products.
articles.abstract: Regulators are demanding information from the company on its cloud computing, artificial intelligence and cybersecurity products.
articles.lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission has opened an investigation into whether Microsoft has violated antitrust law in multiple segments of its wide-ranging business, according to two people familiar with the inquiry, the latest salvo in a battle by the government to rein in the most powerful tech companies.

articles.headline: This 22-Foot Turkey Roosts in a Region of Roadside Giants
articles.snippet: Big Tom is a beloved landmark in his Minnesota hometown. Across the Midwest, small places take pride in having the largest of just about anything.
articles.abstract: Big Tom is a beloved landmark in his Minnesota hometown. Across the Midwest, small places take pride in having the largest of just about anything.
articles.lead_paragraph: The most celebrated resident of Frazee, Minn., is 22 feet tall and is known to his friends simply as Big Tom. He lives alone just off Highway 10, past the metal barns but before the railroad tracks, where admirers show up seeking photos at all hours of the day.
articles.byline: By Mitch Smith and Graham Dickie

articles.headline: Hamas Faces a Future Without Its Most Important Ally
articles.snippet: Israel’s offensive against Hezbollah and the cease-fire to stop the fighting in Lebanon have left Hamas increasingly isolated.
articles.abstract: Israel’s offensive against Hezbollah and the cease-fire to stop the fighting in Lebanon have left Hamas increasingly isolated.
articles.lead_paragraph: Hamas has long believed that a wider war in the Middle East would help deliver the organization a victory in its war with Israel.
articles.byline: By Julian E. Barnes, Adam Rasgon, Aaron Boxerman and Ronen Bergman

articles.headline: Frequent Fliers Are Rethinking Loyalty Programs and Setting Themselves Free
articles.snippet: Some travelers, frustrated with changing airline rewards programs, have stopped chasing status and adopted different strategies when booking flights and using credit cards.
articles.abstract: Some travelers, frustrated with changing airline rewards programs, have stopped chasing status and adopted different strategies when booking flights and using credit cards.
articles.lead_paragraph: When SuzAnn Brantner moved to Indiana from Los Angeles during the coronavirus pandemic, she had been a longtime Delta Air Lines frequent flier, achieving the highest loyalty status the airline offered: Diamond Medallion. The benefits included expedited security screenings, priority boarding and top preference for complimentary first-class upgrades.

articles.headline: Holiday Shopping, Up Close and Personal
articles.snippet: The experience of interacting with small business owners at winter markets makes holiday shopping “a little bit more wholesome” for some visitors.
articles.abstract: The experience of interacting with small business owners at winter markets makes holiday shopping “a little bit more wholesome” for some visitors.
articles.lead_paragraph: Even when Monica Martino was “broke and couldn’t afford anything,” she loved roaming the stalls at New York City’s holiday markets.
articles.byline: By Aimee Ortiz and Jeenah Moon

articles.headline: Donald Trump Jr. Emerges as a Loyal Enforcer
articles.snippet: His siblings have long retreated from the inner circle, but the president-elect’s eldest son has made a name for himself as the person who can best assess loyalty to the Trump political brand.
articles.abstract: His siblings have long retreated from the inner circle, but the president-elect’s eldest son has made a name for himself as the person who can best assess loyalty to the Trump political brand.
articles.lead_paragraph: Ivanka and Jared left the White House behind for a life in Miami. Eric is running the family business. Tiffany got married. Barron is a budding strategist at NYU.

articles.headline: Australia Has Barred Everyone Under 16 From Social Media. Will It Work?
articles.snippet: The law sets a minimum age for users of platforms like TikTok, Instagram and X. How the restriction will be enforced online remains an open question.
articles.abstract: The law sets a minimum age for users of platforms like TikTok, Instagram and X. How the restriction will be enforced online remains an open question.
articles.lead_paragraph: Australia has imposed a sweeping ban on social media for children under 16, one of the world’s most comprehensive measures aimed at safeguarding young people from potential hazards online. But many details were still unclear, such as how it will be enforced and what platforms will be covered.

articles.headline: How a Women’s College Volleyball Team Became the Center of the Transgender Athlete Debate
articles.snippet: Not since the swimmer Lia Thomas has a college athlete or team put the fiercely contested issue of transgender rights in sports under such a bright spotlight.
articles.abstract: Not since the swimmer Lia Thomas has a college athlete or team put the fiercely contested issue of transgender rights in sports under such a bright spotlight.
articles.lead_paragraph: On the court, they seem like any other college women’s volleyball team. At a recent game, the players moved around the court in staccato rhythm, setting and spiking the ball, springing into the air like pogo sticks to block attacking shots, all in their blue and gold uniforms of the San Jose State University Spartans.
